# isExtensionEnabled() function

Checks whether the given ABI supports a given extension

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isExtensionEnabled(
  abi: AbiInput,
  featureName: FeatureName,
): boolean;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type        | Description |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| abi         | AbiInput    |             |
| featureName | FeatureName |             |

**Returns:**

boolean
